caption.title: Analysis of AT8 signal in hippocampi of injected mice.
caption.p: PS19 mice were inoculated with sub-strains from DS9 and DS10 at 3 months into the hippocampus (n = 5 each). After 8 weeks, coronal sections of hippocampus were analyzed by a blinded reviewer educated on different sections as to the characteristics of each clone. One error occurred in analysis of 40 brains.

tr.td: DS10.4 correctly classified 4/5 times, 1/5 incorrectly classified as DS10.3
